member.name: T:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator
member.summary: a class with methods to apply computation logic on any given two numbers, such as addition, subtraction, multiplication and divsion

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method to add two integer type values
member.returns: retruns the addition result of those two values passed as arguments

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Subtract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method to subtract one integer type value from another integer type value
member.returns: retruns the subtraction result of those two values passed as arguments

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method to mutiply one integer type value by another integer type value
member.returns: retruns the multiplication result of those two values passed as arguments

member.name: M:CalculatorLibrary.Calculator.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method to divide one integer type value by another integer type value
member.returns: retruns the division result of those two values passed as arguments
